original_title: La Vie et la Passion de Notre Seigneur Jesus Christ
overview: Pathe begat the Son of Man. The actual title (minus an accent) is La Vie et la Passion de Notre Seigneur Jesus Christ. It is an April 1914 remake of Pathe's 1902-05 version of the same name, and was shot primarily in the studio rather than on location.
title: La Vie et la Passion de Notre Seigneur Jesus Christ
